programme.title: Dennis Skinner
programme.short_synopsis: Sue Lawley's castaway is MP Dennis Skinner
programme.medium_synopsis: Sue Lawley's castaway is MP Dennis Skinner.
programme.long_synopsis:
This week's castaway is Dennis Skinner MP. Recently described as the backbenchers' backbencher, he'll be talking to Sue Lawley about Parliament and politics and choosing eight records to accompany him on his solitary island adventure.

[Taken from the original programme material for this archive edition of Desert Island Discs] 

Favourite track: Daddy, What Did You Do in the Strike? by Peggy Seeger
Book: Let's Face the Music by Benny Green
Luxury: Bike

programme.title: Desert Island Discs
programme.short_synopsis: Kirsty Young invites her castaway guests to share the soundtrack of their lives.
